analysis.description:
ApolloSeptemBaseCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x54c14fcb13772f6c56d09264e8fc3b050a458cdb.sol#157-179) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x54c14fcb13772f6c56d09264e8fc3b050a458cdb.sol#176-177)

ApolloSeptemBaseCrowdsale.specialTransfer (/unique_chucks/20/0x54c14fcb13772f6c56d09264e8fc3b050a458cdb.sol#182-195) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(_to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x54c14fcb13772f6c56d09264e8fc3b050a458cdb.sol#191)

ApolloSeptemBaseCrowdsale.sendAllToOwner (/unique_chucks/20/0x54c14fcb13772f6c56d09264e8fc3b050a458cdb.sol#249-252) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(beneficiary,tokenReward.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/20/0x54c14fcb13772f6c56d09264e8fc3b050a458cdb.sol#251-252)
